raw_comment:
I notice that the graph is color coordinated possibly to leaf color... or season

I wonder why there is a small area in the north that has leaves before the rest of the states around it?

I wonder why is that in the West Coast it's so variated of colors?

Title: Warmer Weather Sooner?
ace_sentences: I notice that the graph is color-coordinated.
The color-coordination possibly relates to leaf color.
The color-coordination possibly relates to season.
There is a small area in the north.
In this area, leaves appear before leaves appear in the surrounding states.
I wonder why leaves appear earlier in this area than in the surrounding states.
The West Coast has varied colors.
I wonder why the colors on the West Coast are so varied.
The title is: Warmer Weather Sooner?
